articles.title: Encyclopedic work for human cause of independence
articles.content:
Press welcomes Hong Kong return to China
Pyongyang, July 1 (KCNA) -- Pyongyang-based newspapers today welcome the return of Hong Kong to the Chinese people in some 150 years of foreign rule.
   Rodong Sinmun says:
   The return of Hong Kong to China is a fruit of the protracted struggle of the Chinese people for national sovereignty and territorial integrity and another brilliant victory of the independent foreign policy of the Chinese Party and Government.
   It is also a product of the efforts of the Chinese Party, Government and people to reunify the whole country in accordance with the "one country, two systems" formula.
   The return of Hong Kong reflects the desire of the Chinese people.
   We warmly welcome the event, feeling so happy as the Chinese people.
   The event clearly shows once again that foreign domination and subjugation cannot last forever and that it is an irresistible historical trend for the divided countries and nations to take the line of reunification, reconciliation and unity.
   The return of Hong Kong to China provides the Chinese people with a favorable climate and phase in their efforts to reunify the whole country.
   We sincerely hope that after Hong Kong's return, everything will go well in china as desired by the Chinese people, and greater progress will be made in the efforts of the Chinese party, Government and people for the reunification of the whole country.
   Minju Joson says:
   The restoration of sovereignty of the People's Republic of China over Hong Kong is great progress in the Chinese people's struggle for the reunification of the country. 
   The Korean people extend warm congratulations to the fraternal Chinese people on this occasion.

articles.title: President Kim Il Sung's reminiscences published in Yugoslavia
articles.content:
Symposium marks 3rd anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's death
 Pyongyang, July 2 (KCNA) -- The Ministry of the People's Armed Forces organised a symposium at the April 25 House of Culture on July 1 on the occasion of the 3rd anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
   Speeches were made by Vice Marshal of the Korean People's Army Jo Myong Rok, Director of the General Political Department of the KPA= KPA Vice Marshal Kim Yong Chun, Chief of the General staff of the KPA= KPA Vice Marshal Kim Il Chol, First Vice-Minister of the People's Armed Forces= and KPA General Pak Jae Gyong.
   The speakers said that it is a noble moral obligation of the KPA soldiers and the Korean people to hold the President in high esteem.
   They recalled that the President performed distinguished exploits for the country and people, the times and humankind.
   They said:
   "In his lifetime, the President visited people's Army units on 2,188 occasions, during which he indicated how to make combat preparations and increase the fighting efficiency and warmly looked after the military activities of soldiers."
   �hThe President enjoys immortality thanks to the noble loyalty and dutifulness of the respected supreme commander comrade Kim Jong Il.�h
   The speakers said that they would put their heart and soul into the work to defend and glorify the revolutionary idea and exploits of the President with the unshakable faith that he is always with them.
   They declared that they would uphold Secretary Kim Jong Il with loyalty and filial piety and resolutely safeguard him with their lives and more relentlessly fight for the accomplishment of national reunification and the revolutionary cause of Juche, more closely united around the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Memorial committees formed on 3rd anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's death
articles.content:
Third anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's death commemorated abroad
 Pyongyang, July 3 (KCNA) -- Lecture meetings, film shows, photo exhibitions and "Day of Korea" functions were held in Romania, Tanzania, Togo, Mali, Bangladesh, Zambia and Italy from June 14 to 23 on the occasion of the third anniversary of the death of President Kim Il Sung.
   Lectures on the subjects "Brilliant life and exploits of his excellency the great President Kim Il Sung" "Smile of the sun" and "Bitterest memorial day of the Korean nation" were given in Tanzania, Togo and Mali.
   The Curator of the Trieste International Goods Fair of Italy in his speech at the "Day of Korea" function said that President Kim Il Sung was a great leader highly respected not only by the Korean people but also by the world people as he devoted his whole life solely to the prosperity of the country, the happiness of the people and the human cause of independence.
   Philip Mangula, Secretary General of the Revolutionary Party of Tanzania, had this to say: "Through films and photos, I could vividly see the unanimous ardent desire of the Korean people to hold comrade President Kim Il Sung in high esteem for all ages."
   "As the respected comrade Kim Jong Il stands in the van of the Korean revolution, the President is immortal and his revolutionary cause is being successfully carried forward and accomplished."

articles.title: 3rd anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's death commemorated abroad
articles.content:
Memorial committees formed on 3rd anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's death
Pyongyang, July 4 (KCNA) -- A Joint Memorial Committee of the Luxemburg-DPRK Friendship Association and the Luxemburg Committee for Supporting the Reunification of Korea and a Czech Memorial Committee were formed on June 27 on the occasion of the 3rd anniversary of the death of President Kim Il Sung.
   Earlier, on June 23, the Central Executive Committee of the Communist Party of Kyrgyzstan formed a memorial committee.
   Vice-chairman of the Party N. I. Baiko was elected chairman of the memorial committee.
   The memorial committees decided to organise memorial meetings,  film shows and other functions.

articles.title: Foreign military attaches meet DPRK heroes
articles.content:
Floral basket to Statue of President Kim Il Sung from Thailand
 Pyongyang, July 5 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun in a signed article today supports a declaration of national reunification published by the National Alliance for the Country's Reunification (Pomminryon) on July 2 on the occasion of the 25th anniversary of the publication of the July 4 North-South Joint Statement.
   The article says:
   Pomminryon's publication of the declaration of national reunification demonstrated again the will of all the fellow countrymen to reunify the country at an early date by the concerted efforts of patriotic-minded people true to the noble idea laid down in the July 4 North-South Joint Statement= it is an epochal and realistic measure to push ahead with reunification movement on a nation-wide scale.
   The reunification of the country should be realised on the basis of the independent viewpoints of the 70 million Korean people as well as their strength and wisdom and in a peaceful way, not by means of war. All the fellow countrymen should unite into one, transcending the difference in ideology, ideal and social system to this end.
   That is why in the declaration of national reunification Pomminryon called upon all the Koreans to turn out in a struggle to adhere to the three principles of national reunification as a reunification programme and charter and carry them into practice.
   The organisation also reiterated that Korea should be reunified by a confederacy formula based on one nation, one state, two systems and two governments. Its call reflects the specific conditions of the country.
   The confederacy formula is the best way of achieving reunification with the north and south not fighting with each other nor encroaching upon each other's interests.
   All the Koreans in the north, south and abroad should firmly unite under the banner of the three principles of national reunification, frustrate the manoeuvrings of the separatist forces at home and abroad and turn out as one in a sacred, patriotic struggle to achieve national reunification, the cherished desire of the nation, at an early date.

articles.title: Adherence to three principles of national reunification called for

ITF President here 
Pyongyang, July 6 (KCNA) -- Choe Hong Hui, President of the International Taekwon-do Federation, and his Party arrived here on July 5.
   They were met at the airport by Kim Yong Sun and Ryu Mi Yong, Chairperson of the Central Committee of the Chondoist Chongu Party.

articles.title: Press review
articles.content:
Trade unionists pledge loyalty 
  Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- Trade unionists made a pledge to uphold the great leader President Kim Il Sung for all ages and remain loyal and devoted to the idea and leadership of Secretary Kim Jong Il in one mind as the President requested.
   Their meeting took place in front of the Party Foundation Monument in Pyongyang on Sunday.
   The reporter and speakers said at the meeting that the President left as precious heritage on this land the greatest idea indicating the ideal and future of humankind, the most powerful party, army and people and the most advantageous Korean-style socialist system.
   Thanks to General Kim Jong Il, the President is immortal as the eternal sun of Juche and his idea and feats will shine forever, they noted.
   They stressed the need to hold the President in higher esteem than when he was alive, do everything as he did and become true loyal and filial subjects absolutely trusting and following only the respected General.

articles.title: Meeting marks Independence of Algeria
articles.content:
Letter to Secy. Kim Jong Il from Chongryon Central Standing Committee 
 Pyongyang, July 8 (KCNA) - Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a letter by the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on July 8, the third death anniversary of Generalissimo Kim Il Sung.
   The letter says:
   It was thanks to the great loving care of Generalissimo Kim Il Sung that the Korean residents in Japan, who had been leading a miserable life as a stateless people, were able to lead a worthy and happy life, engaging themselves in patriotic, sacred work as dignified overseas citizens of a sovereign and independent state.
   You, Secretary Kim Jong Il, are identical to Generalissimo Kim Il Sung in ideology, leadership and virtues, so you are Generalissimo Kim Il Sung of today.
   Kim Jong Il's era, a new stage of the development of Kim Il Sung's era, is another great heyday which adds lustre to the cause of the Generalissimo, the sun, for all ages and brings about greater prosperity of our country and our motherland= it is the era of glory in which Juche Korea throws its brilliant rays all over the world as a symbol of independence of humankind and socialism.
   We will join the people in the homeland in defending the leader with their lives and firmly defend the headquarters of the cause of Juche from all manoeuvrings of the imperialists and traitors, cherishing the patriotic faith and pure conscience of the Generalissimo's soldiers and disciples that led by you, Secretary Kim Jong Il, we will emerge ever-victorious.

articles.title: NDFSK Central Committee issues letter
articles.content:
Pledge to exalt revolutionary feats of President Kim Il Sung 
Pyongyang, July 9 (KCNA)-- Working people from all walks of life, soldiers of the Korean People's Army and youth and students visited revolutionary museums, revolutionary battle sites, revolutionary sites and units associated with immortal revolutionary relics throughout the country on July 8, the third death anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, and took a pledge of loyalty and filial piety to exalt the revolutionary feats of President Kim Il Sung for all ages.
   Through their visit, they kept the immortal revolutionary exploits of the President again in their mind and vowed to demonstrate Kim Il Sung Korea all over the world by exalting his revolutionary feats under the leadership of Secretary Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Crackdown on " Hanchongryon"  under fire
articles.content:
National art show held 
 Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- A national art show on the subject of "The great leader comrade Kim Il Sung will always be with us" is open at the Korean Art Gallery.
   Exhibited there are more than 100 art pieces portraying President Kim Il Sung.
   The art pieces exhibited in chronological order reflect the glorious revolutionary activities, noble traits and undying feats of President Kim Il Sung.
   Many art pieces portraying the president have been produced in Korea.
   The oil painting "Torch in Pochonbo" was the first to portray the President in Korea.
   The well-known painting drawn in 1955 depicts the President in military uniform speaking with his clenched fist held up before the cheering people. 
   It was followed by the Korean paintings "a protracted, bloody anti-Japanese struggle" and "always mixing with the people", an oil painting "on the road of advance", a germ-painting "greeting spring in alien land" and many other works.
   Most of them show the President among the people.
   In the last three years the creators and artists of the Mansudae Art Studio produced hundreds of works portraying the President.
   Scores of Korean, oil and graphic paintings were created in the 100-day mourning period from July 9, 1994.
   The continuous production of art pieces depicting the President proves that the President is alive as the eternal sun in the hearts of the Korean people.

Floral baskets from Russia 
  Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- Floral baskets came from Mikhail Monastirski, Chairman of the Southeast Asia and Asia-Pacific Regional Sub-Committee of Geopolitical Affairs Committee of the State Duma of Russia and Chairman of the Russo-Korean Chamber of Commerce, and Sazhi Umalatova, Chairperson of the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia, on the third death anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
   They were laid before his statue on Mansu Hill in Pyongyang.

articles.title: U.S. scheme to keep its troops in Japan
articles.content:
Pomminryon overseas delegates urge release of reunification champions in s. Korea
 Pyongyang, July 12 (KCNA) -- Delegates of overseas regional headquarters of the National Alliance for the Country's Reunification (Pomminryon) made public a joint statement in Pyongyang on July 10 denouncing the south Korean authorities for brutally cracking down upon pro-reunification, patriotic forces.
   Some time ago, the south Korean authorities arrested acting chairman of the Pomminryon South Headquarters Ri Jong Rin, its vice-chairmen, the director of its Secretariat and the Chairman of the South Korean Federation of University 
Student councils (hanchongryon), that is, the south headquarters of the National Alliance of Youth and Students For the Country's Reunification (Pomchonghakryon), on charges of "donation to the north" and inauguration of the fifth-term "Hanchongryon".
   This brutal crackdown upon the pro-reunification, patriotic forces is aimed at destroying the reunification movement and foiling the planned August 15 reunification functions of all the pro-reunification movement organisations in south Korea, which are trying in all sincerity to hold them, the statement said, and continued:
   We cannot but take a serious view of the fact that the south Korean authorities are using compatriotic assistance to the north for their ulterior purpose.
   The more frantically the south Korean authorities are engaged in the crackdown, the more closely the south headquarters of Pomminryon, "Hanchongryon", "National Alliance for Democracy and Reunification" and other pro-reunification patriotic forces will unite as unbreakable organisations firmly determined to work for reunification and the more powerfully they will struggle for the sacred cause of national reunification.
   We overseas Koreans will as ever dynamically fight for the great national unity hand in hand with south Koreans. In particular, we will make every possible effort to take the upcoming August 15 as a historic occasion in making a turning-point for national independence, peace and national unity.
   The south Korean authorities must look straight at the trend of history and the nation, stop the reckless acts against reunification at once and release all the detained pro-reunification, patriotic-minded figures without delay.
